definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: I want to sooth your upset soul with my soft and sweet whispers.
sentences.chinese: 想用我輕柔溫情的呢喃，撫慰你驛動不安的心靈。

sentences.english: Are you fed up with ga$oline price$ and THE POLLUTION?
sentences.chinese: 你喂街$溫情滿滿的價格上漲和環境污染問題？

sentences.english: It’s a film full of affection and humor.
sentences.chinese: 這可謂是一部充滿了溫情和幽默感的電影。

sentences.english: Have abandoned the absurdity of the original work and revealed that satirizes meaning, have added a kind of tender feeling for the film.
sentences.chinese: 對故事進行了修飾和美化，爲影片增添了一種溫情。

sentences.english: This is my caritative and warmhearted motherland.
sentences.chinese: 這是我博大而溫情的祖國。

sentences.english: Who could taste the warmhearted feelings of watching for the little corner?
sentences.chinese: 誰又能體會到平平淡淡地守候着這個角落的溫情呢？

sentences.english: It was full of tender feeling and sentiment, loneliness and warmth.
sentences.chinese: 溫情又傷感，孤寂又溫馨。

sentences.english: Full of tender feelings, she gazes at Xiao Wang, and says nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她一言不發，只是溫情脈脈地注視着小王。

sentences.english: This winter good hope softhearted and is warm.
sentences.chinese: 這個冬天好渴望溫情和溫暖。

sentences.english: Lies when all comfort, warmth even more false I also relieved.
sentences.chinese: 謊言全當安慰，多些溫情即便虛假我也寬慰。

sentences.english: Pinot Noir is one of those perplexing wines it is classy elegant and at times a little shy.
sentences.chinese: 加州紅葡萄酒是複雜的葡萄酒，優雅而溫情脈脈。

sentences.english: You think God zaps them with warm, fuzzy feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得上帝會馬上給他們注入溫情嗎？

sentences.english: Compared with the godfather's grimness , his tender feeling can move me even more .
sentences.chinese: 與教父的冷酷相比，他的溫情更能打動我。

sentences.english: Don't be too lenient with him.
Harbor's tender friendship, the friendship between the breeze filled Zhengfan.
sentences.chinese: 友誼的港灣溫情脈脈，友誼的清風灌滿征帆。

sentences.english: After passion, perhaps you still yearn for warmth of a lingering " suffixal " .
sentences.chinese: 激情之後，也許你還渴望一個纏綿溫情的“後綴”。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
